nodes.text: Walkers and Ground Vehicles of the Empire and the First Order
"Walkers and Ground Vehicles of the Empire and the First Order" is a booklet in a series of canon reference booklets titled the Star Wars Encyclopedia. It was published on May 11, 2021.

The Galactic Empire imposed its yoke through a powerful navy and an army that not only had trained troops, but also vehicles that could be decisive in any battle. Whether with two or four legs, the walkers were key pieces in any battalion. Often inspired by other Republic vehicles, these heavily armored and armored monsters spread panic among enemies. As the ideological heir to the Empire, the First Order was not far behind in that regard and adapted many models of walkers and ground vehicles, improving them in some cases and including them in an armed forces with which they hoped to definitively dominate the entire galaxy.
